segment.source: MED-V uses Microsoft Virtual PC to provide an enterprise solution for desktop virtualization.
segment.target: MED-V uses Microsoft Virtual PC to provide an enterprise solution for desktop virtualization.

segment.source: With MED-V, you can easily create, deliver, and manage corporate Virtual PC images on any Windows®-based desktop.
segment.target: With MED-V, you can easily create, deliver, and manage corporate Virtual PC images on any Windows®-based desktop.

segment.source: MED-V is an integral component of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack, a dynamic solution available to Software Assurance customers, which helps reduce application deployment costs, enables delivery of applications as services, and helps to better manage and control enterprise desktop environments.
segment.target: MED-V is an integral component of the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack, a dynamic solution available to Software Assurance customers, which helps reduce application deployment costs, enables delivery of applications as services, and helps to better manage and control enterprise desktop environments.
